mapper.insert: insert into nc_course (course_id, course_name, course_teacher_id, course_teacher_name, course_intro, course_notice) values (#{course_id}, #{course_name}, #{course_teacher_id}, #{course_teacher_name}, #{course_intro}, #{course_notice})

insert into nc_record (record_id, record_course_id, record_deliver_id, record_deliver_name, record_receiver_id, record_receiver_name, record_message, record_time) values (#{record_id}, #{record_course_id}, #{record_deliver_id}, #{record_deliver_name}, #{record_receiver_id}, #{record_receiver_name}, #{record_message}, #{record_time})
insert into nc_notice (notice_id, notice_course_id, notice_content, notice_time) values (#{notice_id}, #{notice_course_id}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_time})
